About Me

I am a young professional, graduated in Computer Science and having a year of working experience as a software research and development engineer at silicon valley’s startup named securiti.ai where I design and develop different small tools and microservices in Python and Golang, research about the cybersecurity and data protection regulatory compliances and frameworks such as CCPA and GDPR.

I have also worked with different programming languages, front-end technology stacks such as HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and javascript, MVC frameworks such as Laravel and Ruby on Rails in my whole internships and freelancing career. I am also familiar with the DevOps technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes and Ansible as I am always eager to learn and ready to take on new challenges and work with different technology stack.

Research

Academic Research

https://i.ibb.co/ygh4Jr4/scan0009-page-001.jpg

Process of Image Colorization Using Convolutional Neural Network

Oct 2018

Abstract

This research paper is based on the multiple method of image colorization. Among the image recognition and object detection algorithms, the mechanism based on deep neural networks shows the unrivaled performance. Still the problem of image colorization methods depends heavily on human interaction. Unlike other existing proposed method which are based on machine learning or generic image descriptor that degrades the recognition rate of image and also to avoid the usage of large database. Our proposed model is an assortment based on algorithms of structure, objects, and functions, the preprocessing and post processing image colorization. System consists of training and testing phases. Feature abstraction and pixel-mapping from the input colored image results in the training of the system.

Apart from professional information, I have been involved in different volunteering activities and have been a part of The Citizen Organization where I have volunteered in the Rahbar’s Program for six weeks. I am a sports lover and love to play Badminton at Pakistan Sports Board, Swimming at Women Sports Complex and Cycling with GG Riders on every weekend. I am also really fond of Traveling and Hunza-Gilgit Baltistan is one of my favourite place to travel solo. I like to read books in my leisure time and stephen covey is one of my favourite writter. My ultimate goals are to become a good programmer and travel around the world. I also write technical blogs on Medium in my leisure time.
